text:
> Sounds almost easy :p
Almost :slightly_smiling_face:. I do not plan to support the full latex math syntax (matplotlib mathtext engine doesn't either) as it is huge, and I only have plan for the parser right now. Quite quickly however you need a lot of stuff something like $\vec{v}^{(i)}$ display to something simple but already requires grouping and stacking symbols.

text: Also since we use julia, there is no worry to have about latex preventing the use of other methods/convention. The plan is likely to the use of the LaTeXString macro `L"..."` which would allow `text` to display on the type to decide if latex parsing/rendering should happen. Another method could be added without problem by just having `text` dispatch on the corresponding type.
